name: Launchpad
title: C++ Training in Delhi, Greater Noida, Amritsar & Jalandhar | Launchpad by Coding Blocks

metas.name: description
metas.content: Coding Blocks is the best C++ training institute in Delhi, Greater Noida, Jalandhar and Amritsar. Join Launchpad to get C++ coaching and learn C++ fundamentals.

openGraph.title: Launchpad : Programming Fundamentals in C++
openGraph.description: Coding Blocks is the best C++ training institute in Delhi, Greater Noida, Jalandhar and Amritsar. Join Launchpad to get C++ coaching and learn C++ fundamentals.

overview.content:
Launchpad is a C++ training course designed to provide you with a platform from where you can start your journey in the amazing world of programming and software. A beginners’ course including basic programming fundamentals, object oriented programming and in-depth coverage of data structures and algorithms.

C++ is known to be a very powerful language. C++ allows you to have a lot of control as to how you use computer resources effectively and efficiently better than other languages. Thanks to C++'s performance, it is often used to develop game engines, games, and desktop apps. As a statically typed language, C++ is generally more performant than dynamically typed languages because the code is type-checked before it is executed. Companies like Google and Facebook, also need C++ developers to optimize their apps or work on their products.

courseHighlights.title: Fundamentals
courseHighlights.content: We have designed our C++ fundamentals course keeping in mind the requirements of beginners. Course starts with fundamentals of logic building and problem solving. Many tricky Puzzles are also given to build logical thinking of our students.

courseHighlights.title: Problem Solving
courseHighlights.content: The C++ course is designed to sharpen the problem solving skills, using C++, of the students. We follow step-by-step approach to make students fall in love with programming and ignite their passion of coding with the help of problems ranging to easy to intermediate to expert level.

courseHighlights.title: OOP Concepts & Project
courseHighlights.content: Emphasis is given on building strong Object Oriented Programming Concepts and coding practices followed in the Software Industry, so to make our students industry-ready C++ coders.

courseHighlights.title:
Data Structures 
& Algorithms
courseHighlights.content: This course entails more than 100 hours of teaching and hands on C++ coding. Students will be solving more than 200 complex problems in C++ and will be evaluated for their problem solving skills and understanding of data structures throughout the course.

courseContents.title: Logic Building
courseContents.contentTitle: C++ Programming fundamentals and logic building
courseContents.description: Course will start with basic understanding of logic. We will be discussing about Flowcharts, PsudoCode and students will solve also some of the Puzzles in initial classes.

courseContents.title: C++ Basics
courseContents.description: Then we will dive deep into C++ topics like Arrays, solving problems with Recursion, understanding about pointers and multi-dimensional arrays.

courseContents.title: OOP
courseContents.description: In this part we learn about how to compute space-time complexity of our solution and how can we optimise our solutions. We will also learn about OOPs and recommended coding practices.

courseContents.title: Data Structures
courseContents.description: This is the most important and exciting part and yet easy. Data structures are all about storing data.You will learn to implement different data structures and when to use them. This part is important as most of the questions asked in interviwes are related to data structures.

courseContents.title: Advanced Data Structures & Algorithms
courseContents.contentTitle: Heaps, Hash Tables, Graphs, Tries, Dynamic Programming
courseContents.description: In this final classes of our course, we will learn about more complex data structures and algorithms which help you in solving and optimising solutions of lots of problems.

faqs.ans: Anybody who is interested in learning C++ programming can do this course. C++ is a powerful language and is pretty easy to learn. Coding in its most essential form is nothing but problem solving. It deals with figuring out logical solutions and implementing them optimally. The process of learning to code transforms a person into an analytical thinker with strong mathematical and logical skills.

faqs.ques: Will this course help if I have C++ in class 12th?
faqs.ans: Yes, absolutely. There is a lot more to learn in C++ than the school curriculum. School syllabus just scratches the surface of C++ programming and doesn’t cover most of the Data Structures, which will be covered in this course in great detail.

faqs.ques: I didn’t have C++ in class 12 ? Can I do this course ?
faqs.ans: Yes. Our instructors will start the C++ course from beginner's level. You don’t need any prior programming knowledge to attend this course. What we need is dedication and passion to learn programming from your side.

faqs.ques: Will this help me with competitive programming or can I apply to ACM-ICPC after doing this course?
faqs.ans: This course will help you become smarter with your solutions. You’ll be able to write solutions that run in lesser space and time. The last time we heard from capable competitive programmers, they said these skills made them capable.

faqs.ques: Will this course help me in Interviews?
faqs.ans: Yes, absolutely. Our course is designed in such a way it covers from fundamentals to advanced topics. Many frequently asked Interview questions will be done in the class and in assignments. We will have special interview talks by industry experts from reputed companies.
